con:testCase.name: AC06-BlockedDebtorAccount
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for AC06-BlockedDebtorAccount

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' and ROWNUM = 1

con:property.con:name: receiveMessagePain002
con:property.con:value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.002.001.04"> <CstmrPmtStsRpt> <GrpHdr> <MsgId>600685.6907.296827</MsgId> <CreDtTm>2020-10-15T12:08:59.999+02:00</CreDtTm> <InitgPty> <Nm>Mentor Medier AS</Nm> <Id> <OrgId> <AnyBIC>SHEDNO22XXX</AnyBIC> <Othr> <Id>122032456</Id> <SchmeNm> <Cd>BANK</Cd> </SchmeNm> </Othr> <Othr> <Id>537812</Id> <SchmeNm> <Cd>USAG</Cd> </SchmeNm> </Othr> </OrgId> </Id> </InitgPty> </GrpHdr> <OrgnlGrpInfAndSts> <OrgnlMsgId>Err_151020033853</OrgnlMsgId> <OrgnlMsgNmId>pain.001.001.04</OrgnlMsgNmId> </OrgnlGrpInfAndSts> <OrgnlPmtInfAndSts> <OrgnlPmtInfId>Pmt_Err_151020033853</OrgnlPmtInfId> <StsRsnInf> <Rsn> <Cd>AC06</Cd> </Rsn> <AddtlInf>Debtor account is blocked for withdrawal</AddtlInf> </StsRsnInf> <TxInfAndSts> <OrgnlInstrId>Ins1_Err_151020033853</OrgnlInstrId> <OrgnlEndToEndId>ETE_Err_151020033853</OrgnlEndToEndId> <TxSts>RJCT</TxSts> <StsRsnInf> <AddtlInf>338427</AddtlInf> </StsRsnInf> </TxInfAndSts> <TxInfAndSts> <OrgnlInstrId>Ins2_Err_151020033853</OrgnlInstrId> <OrgnlEndToEndId>ETE_Err_151020033853</OrgnlEndToEndId> <TxSts>RJCT</TxSts> <StsRsnInf> <AddtlInf>338428</AddtlInf> </StsRsnInf> </TxInfAndSts> </OrgnlPmtInfAndSts> </CstmrPmtStsRpt> </Document>

con:property.con:name: expectedStatusReason
con:property.con:value: Debtor account is blocked for withdrawal

con:property.con:name: actualStatusReason
con:property.con:value: Debtor account is blocked for withdrawal

con:config.con:query: select m.MESSAGEID , p.paymentinfoid,t.transactionsid , t.ENDTOENDID , t.PAYMENTTYPE, t.PAYMENTSTATUS, t.ISPC , t.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID from message m , paymentinfo p , transactions t where m.messageid = p.fk_messageid and p.paymentinfoid = t.fk_paymentinfoid and t.ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%' and PAYMENTSTATUS = 'REJC'

select * from statusreason S, STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF SI where S.STATUSREASONID = SI.FK_STATUSREASONID and (S.FK_TRANSACTIONID = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}' OR S.FK_Paymentinfoid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PAYMENTINFOID[1]}' or s.FK_messageid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/MESSAGEID[1]}') order by CODE desc

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Debtor account is blocked for withdrawal

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: 83594 AC06 PAIN 210015 63197 83594 Debtor account is blocked for withdrawal
